item.title: Realizing the power of Hugo shortcodes - Profile icons section
item.description: Hugo shortcodes offer a great method to modularize a website, separating content from other code. My website has some hacky code snippets for certain parts of it. I know that being sloppy from the beggining is never a good omen so I try to be as strict as possible with myself.
